name: Le Siège de Nebulia
description:
Disclaimer: the game is only in French, and since it's a textual game, if you are not able to read French it will be hard to play. But hey, Google Traduction is there for you if you really want to live the adventure of Nebulia !

I made this textual game with Twine as an assignment at University for my Narrative Design course. 

In this game, you follow the story of Jim a dude who doesn't do anything with its life until destiny knock at its door, literally. You will have the opportunity to live an adventure or not. Every choice is your own in this story.

I'm really proud of some portions of this game like the labyrinth in the forest based on the Lost Wood Forest in the Zelda franchise.

Have fun playing and don't forget to left any comment on your experience !

- FL
